alert.note: Alert for Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 02 at 6:20PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Kauai in Kauai County through 715 PM HST... At 619 PM HST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout over Kapaa, or 8 miles north of Lihue. HAZARD...Possible landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over sparsely populated areas of Kauai in Kauai County, including the following locations: Puhi...Kalihiwai... Hanamaulu...Kealia and Wailua River State Park. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Kauai East; Kauai Mountains; Kauai North; Kauai South; Kauai Southwest
